Introduction

Hyuna is a South Korean Singer, Composer and Artist under A Flat Entertainment. She is best known as a former member of Korean girl group 9MUSES. She is now a member of the duo Me:us.

After Jaekyung left the group in October 2010, Star Empire Entertainment said that she will become the newest member of the 9MUSES. On August 18, 2011, she made her formal debut with the group with the release of the digital song "Figaro".

Following Sera's graduation on June 23, 2014, she was then appointed as 9MUSES' leader. And on October 3, 2016, the agency announced Hyuna's graduation from the group following six years of activities.

Hyuna later on debuted solo on March 22, 2017 with the digital single 'Cricket Song'.

On March 22 2020 Hyuna announced on Instagram that she was pregnant with her first child. She also shared a video of her sonogram, which began with the caption “Don’t be shocked” and concluded with the words “Let’s meet in June.”

On April 17, 2022 she debuted as one of the duo of the group Me:us with their first digital single 'Memories'.
